title: Z390
author: Z390
content: Proudly Nigerian here, I have read a lot and ask question about hardware wallet too, I am now fully ready to make my first purchase of a hardware wallet,  the problem I am facing is the official hardware wallet says they don't support my location. I want to ask 1. Is it safe to ship the hardware wallet to my cousin in the UK and he will send it back to me in Nigeria or this is a good idea? I read that it's safer to buy from official than going to third-party store,  I don't want something malicious inserted in the hardware wallet,  waiting for my first deposit into the wallet. 2. I am sure that we have Nigerian on here, how do you guys get your hardware wallet? How do you order for one and get shipped down to Nigeria?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Hardware wallet can be shipped hardware wallet to Nigeria, I have seen hardware wallet companies like Trezor and Ledger Nano added Nigeria to the lists of countries they can ship to. Which hardware wallet are you buying? Just to let you know if the company producing the hardware wallet can be able to ship to Nigeria, or to check for official reseller that can ship to Nigeria.

comments.author: Smack That Ace
comments.body: If it is as Charles-Tim said, you can order directly from the company to your address. As long as your country doesn't ban bitcoin, then ordering is easy, not difficult, try it. Or if you get stuck, I think you should ask your cousin for help, never buy hardware wallets from third party stores.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: Z390 on March 02, 2023, 12:52:28 PM1. Is it safe to ship the hardware wallet to my cousin in the UK and he will send it back to me in Nigeria or this is a good idea? I read that it's safer to buy from official than going to third-party store,  I don't want something malicious inserted in the hardware wallet,  waiting for my first deposit into the wallet. This is safe because this is just another form of drop shipping. I’m not from Nigeria but I this when I bought my first hardware wallet before there’s official reseller here in my country become available.Buying on official store is indeed safer that buying on random guy that reselling this item without license since they might tampered the hardware that will put your investment at risk. If you don’t have any way to ship directly the hardware wallet to hour house then doing this method is your safest way assuming that you can trust your cousin in UK.

comments.author: armanda90
comments.body: I don't think have problem with purchasing hardware wallet although with unsupported location, seems each hardware wallet payment kinds not only adopted or use Bitcoin as payment transaction but still have other payment like PayPal for purchasing hardware wallet. All countries seems support location for purchasing hardware wallet although your country have banned Bitcoin.Usually each country have store official and you can buy there without need to import from other countries, but will be highest values than official store with your hardware wallet to buy.

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on March 02, 2023, 01:26:40 PMHardware wallet can be shipped hardware wallet to Nigeria, I have seen hardware wallet companies like Trezor and Ledger Nano added Nigeria to the lists of countries they can ship to.@Charles-TimI am speaking from Bangladesh, trading and investing using all types of cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin is totally prohibited by the government and central bank in Bangladesh. In my country we cannot import hardware wallets at will. We do not have any system for buying and selling hardware wallets commercially. I would like to know if there is a hardware wallet shipment system in Nigeria with Bangladesh?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: LDL on March 02, 2023, 01:46:38 PMI am speaking from Bangladesh, trading and investing using all types of cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin is totally prohibited by the government and central bank in Bangladesh. In my country we cannot import hardware wallets at will. We do not have any system for buying and selling hardware wallets commercially. I would like to know if there is a hardware wallet shipment system in Nigeria with Bangladesh?It is true that cryptocurrencies are banned in Bangladesh, but I was surprised that Trezor support sending to your country, I also later checked Ledger Nano lists of unsupported countries, I could not see your country among as well. If you have tried to order hardware wallet from a hardware wallet company to Bangladesh and not able to, I mean if the hardware wallet is returned back to the manufacturer, maybe it is possible to buy one from a neighboring country.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: Z390 on March 02, 2023, 12:52:28 PM1. Is it safe to ship the hardware wallet to my cousin in the UK and he will send it back to me in Nigeria or this is a good idea? I read that it's safer to buy from official than going to third-party store,  I don't want something malicious inserted in the hardware wallet,  waiting for my first deposit into the wallet. It should be sure if he makes a purchase for hardware wallet from official shop or from UK resellers, and then send you the unopened package.Anything can happen in customs, but you can always confirm if wallet is authentic or not, and generate brand new seed words for your wallet.You can also make your own alternative DIY signing device (krux, seegsigner, diy trezor), or you can use old smartphone as offline wallet (if you remove sim card and turn on airplane mode).

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: There are many people here who might be using hardware wallets in Nigeria and we have strong community also for those people here so is there any shipping issue directly to Nigeria from companies?As I tried to find out from ledger official site they are also delivering to Nigeria according to them and you can see the expected time for delivery also like here:You can also find more details hereThere is one more site specifically for Nigerians anf you can check it out here  but if possible buy from the official sites only to get without tempered products and keep your seed phrases safe with you.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: Cold storage isn't only a hardware wallet, you can create your own cold storage by using Electrum in a cheap phone, laptop or PC [1]Not a good idea to buy a hardware wallet from unsupported location, are you willing to take a risk if you need to face a legal problem and might have a chance to go jail? if you can accept that risk, then you can buy it. But if not, it's better if you not doing that and looking for the other way to securing your coins.[1] https://electrum.readthedocs.io/en/latest/coldstorage.html
